College_Summary: Vidya Jyoti Eduversity is a private institution established in the year 2006 in Chandigarh, Punjab. VJES Chandigarh is affiliated with IKG Punjab Technical University. It has partnered with various organizations like, the University of West London UK, SIAM University, Euhofa International, TAFE South Australia, etc. Vidya Jyoti Eduversity offers 60+ full-time and part-time courses in multiple disciplines ranging from Commerce, Science, Management, Certificate and Diploma courses. The admission to the courses offered by VJES is based on the marks scored by the candidate in the previous qualifying examination. Vidya Jyoti Eduversity has two campuses located in Chandigarh and Bangkok. The organization has 8 colleges/ centres under it. Additionally, the faculty of the college is one of its major highlights. The professors of Vidya Jyoti Eduversity are highly educated and mentor the students at every step of their course. It also offers merit-based scholarships to students. All the necessary facilities are offered by the institute like, AC classrooms, Hostels, Library, Cafeteria, Medical Facilities, etc.

College_Summary: Panjab University (PU), also known as Panjab University Chandigarh (PUCHD), is a public research university located in Chandigarh, India. Established in 1882, it is one of the oldest universities in India and is known for its high standards of teaching and research. PU is ranked by several ranking agencies such as NIRF, Times Higher Education, and QS (Asia). Panjab University is ranked 44th by the NIRF in the Overall University rankings category of its 2023 ranking. Panjab University is an AICTE-approved university and has 188 affiliated colleges in eight districts of Punjab and the UT of Chandigarh. Check Panjab University Affiliated Colleges

Dr. Ambedkar Institute of Hotel Management, Catering and Nutrition (IHM) was established in the year 1990. It is located in Chandigarh. It is among the 21 Central IHM’s setup by the Ministry of Tourism, Government of India. It is a renowned institute known for imparting hospitality education to students to train them for the hospitality industry.

College_Summary: University Institute of Legal Studies (UILS), Chandigarh was established in 2004 as constituent department of Panjab University. UILS has emerged as one of the premier legal Institute with a unique blend of tradition and modernity. Its mission is to equip the students with the skills to comprehend and diagnose the intricacies of various legal and other inter-disciplinary issues and devise solutions to these problems through analysis and reasoning. The Institute also exposes its students to the 'law in action' through compulsory internships with hon'ble Judges of Supreme Court, Punjab and Haryana High Court, eminent lawyers, legal firms, various commissions and NGOs, etc.

College_Summary: PEC, Chandigarh (Deemed to be University), formerly known as Mugalpura Engineering College in Lahore, was founded in 1921 and is affiliated with Punjab University. With a vast campus spanning 146 acres, the university is a Grant-in-Aid program administered by the Indian government's Union Territory of Chandigarh. The institute provides 8 UG, 14 PG, and a PhD program in a variety of engineering, scientific, management, humanities, and social science fields. Admission to UG and PG programs is determined by national-level tests known as JEE Mains and GATE, respectively with 2 centers of excellence and 9 academic departments.

College_Summary: Goswami Ganesh Dutt Sanatan Dharama College, Chandigarh established in the year 1973 is accredited by the NAAC with A+ grade and honored with the status of ‘A College with Potential for Excellence’ by the UGC. GGDSD is ranked 99th in All India Ranking by NIRF (2019). The college offers profuse UG, PG, and doctorate level courses with multiple specializations. Admission to all the courses is done on the basis of merit except M.Sc. For M.S. students are required to present PU CET scores. Candidates who wish to take admission in the GGDSD college have to register themselves online on the college official website and apply for the respective courses there. Also, the NCCMP Course of the college is recognized by NSE.

College_Summary: Baddi University of Emerging Sciences and Technologies (BUEST), commonly known as Baddi University was established in 2002 and recognized as a university in 2009. Spread over 40 acres of land, the institute has built up an impressive structure for academics with project-based learning and excellent placements. Admission to professional courses in the university is entirely based on Merit. The merit list is prepared by analyzing the marks scored by candidates in the entrance examination conducted by the University. The University conducts entrance examinations in both offline and online mode. It offers various courses in fields such as engineering, management, nursing, etc.

It institutes are approved by the All India Council for Technical Education, Ministry of HRD, and Government of India and recognized by the Government of Punjab. College_Name: PG Government College for Girls, Chandigarh

College_Summary: Indian Institute of Fashion and Design (IIFD) at Chandigarh that got established in the year 2004 is one of the most premier institutes for fashion and design in Chandigarh today. IIFD is featured and recognized as one of the Top 10 Best Fashion Institutes for the year 2022 in India by Education Scopup Magazine.The college offers around 23 courses across 5 streams. Admissions are offered to the college on the basis of merit. The college provides theoretical as well as practical field exposure to the students that makes them highly skilled professionals. It organizes various workshops and activities to enhance the soft skills and practical knowledge of the students. The institute remains open for 7 days a week to cater regular classes and on weekend’s doubts sessions are organized for the students who want to learn more about the topics, and be market-ready for the career paths. IIFD prepares students for professional excellence in design and business through rigorous and adaptable academic programs, experiential learning and innovative partnerships. The institute has signed MoU with Fabbusse Africa to Fashion Design education internationally.

It is approved by University Grants Commission (UGC) and Distance Education Board (DEB) and provides education at one’s doorstep for those who are not able to access the education from any sorts. USOL offers Undergraduate, Post graduate, Diploma, Professional courses and certification programs.

Students will also have access to placement support from the university.

Government College of Arts in Chandigarh is a public institution established in 1951. The college offers 4 courses, namely, BFA, MFA, Diploma, and Advanced Diploma in Applied Arts, Graphics, Painting, and Sculpture. Admission to BFA and Diploma is made on marks obtained by the candidate in the Aptitude test conducted by the college. Admission to MFA and Advance Diploma is made on merits obtained in previous the previous qualifying examination and the portfolio of work presented by the candidates at the counseling.

College_Summary: Government Polytechnic for Women (GPTW) is a public/ government Institute located in Chandigarh, offering various specialized diploma courses. It was established by the State Government of Punjab to promote women education and it has earned the reputation as one of the best women polytechnic colleges in the area. It is affiliated to Punjab State Board of Technical Education and Industrial Training. The overall administrative control of the Institute rests with the Directorate of Technical Education, Chandigarh. The Institute is teamed with 35 full-time faculty for educating students.

The PGDM course is available in four specializations namely, Finance, Marketing, Human Resource Management and Entrepreneurship & General Management. The institute offers 100% placement assistance.
